# Japan

```{r echo = FALSE, out.width = "25%", out.extra='style="float:right; padding:10px"'}

knitr::include_graphics("images/okazaki_castle.jpg")
```

My home country is Japan, a country located in the Far East. I have lived in places called Saitama near Tokyo and Aichi in the central part of the main island. I believed until recently that I acquired Tokyo Japanese, but my Japanese seems to pick up features heard in the region of Aichi and Gifu, which to my Tokyo friends sounds like a western accent. 

My family also lives in Aichi, but also in some other places including Kobe and Yamaguchi.
